structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 24.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Money paid to officers and employes of executive departments, report and accounting of.
